name: Rice With Mushrooms and Pistachios
keywords: gluten-free, mushroom, pistachio, rice, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups fresh or canned chicken broth

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tablespoon of the butter in a saucepan and add onions. Cook briefly, stirring, until wilted. Add mushrooms and cook, stirring, about 2 minutes.
Add nuts and rice and stir to blend. Add broth, salt and pepper and stir. Cover and simmer exactly 17 minutes. Uncover and stir in the remaining 1 tablespoon butter.
